pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian IRT Ideal Point Models with 'Stan' // Offers item- response theory (IRT) ideal-point scaling/dimension reduction methods that incorporate additional response categories and missing/censored values, including absences and abstentions, for roll call voting data (or any other kind of binary or ordinal item-response theory data). Full and approximate Bayesian inference is done via the 'Stan' engine (www.mc- stan.org).
